full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal for Wire Lifter Acquisition

#### General Information

* **Tender Reference #**: WS4630016788
* **Publication Date**: June 28, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 23, 2024, 2:00 p.m.

#### Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals from qualified vendors for the acquisition of a Wire Lifter, including manuals and maintenance data sheets, for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC). The Wire Lifter is required for use in Brome-Missisquoi, Quebec.

#### Brief Requirements
The awarded contract is expected to commence on September 9, 2024. The principal place of delivery will be Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region).

#### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
c/o 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information

Contact Name: Erin Flanagan, PWGSC/SPAC (elle-la / she-her)
Contact Email: [erin.flanagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.flanagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Url: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20162691?extsite=MjAxNjI2OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== 

#### Classifications and Trade Agreements

* Classifications: UNSPSC codes 21000000, 21100000, 21101700, 21102000, 21102100
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Mandatory Language
French is the official language; the Government of Canada's Official Languages Act applies to this solicitation. All Company documentation submitted with the tender must be in French.
